title: classical music/play identity inspiration
content:
Hi,

What identities/campaigns of classical music festivals, theatre plays, operas etc could you recommend for inspiration?

Cheers,  
AL

 [‹ Help Wanted, font modification](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32049 "Go to previous forum topic") [What typeface(s) works well with Futura? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32034 "Go to next forum topic")
author: aleksander

comments.content:
National Theatre  
 [http://www.ntposters.org.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.ntposters.org.uk/ "http://www.ntposters.org.uk/")

English National Opera  
 [http://astore.amazon.co.uk/englishnation-21/026-4632524-9608460?%5Fencod...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/astore.amazon.co.uk/englishnation-21/026-4632524-9608460?%5Fencoding=UTF8&node=1 "http://astore.amazon.co.uk/englishnation-21/026-4632524-9608460?%5Fencoding=UTF8&node=1")

Polish  
 [http://www.polishposter.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.polishposter.com/ "http://www.polishposter.com/")

Czech  
 [http://www.jidpo.or.jp/worlddesign/backnumber/czech/50/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.jidpo.or.jp/worlddesign/backnumber/czech/50/index.html "http://www.jidpo.or.jp/worlddesign/backnumber/czech/50/index.html")

Bit of a shotgun response, I’m afraid.  
Tim

Did one a few years ago while at university. I’d be glad to receive comments on it ;)  
 [http://www.istockphoto.com/design\_spotlight\_details.php?ID=2590](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.istockphoto.com/design_spotlight_details.php?ID=2590 "http://www.istockphoto.com/design\_spotlight\_details.php?ID=2590")
The [Arena Stage](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152400/http:/www.arenastage.org/) here in Washington has great, award-winning identity and promotional design.
